definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

pinyin: ying4 yong4 cheng2 shi4 jie4 mian4

sentences.english: The sending application specifies response queues when the application sends its messages.
sentences.chinese: 传回至回应伫列的讯息是应用程式指定的。

sentences.english: Some programs, such as script applications, do not have their own processes.
sentences.chinese: 某些像是指令码应用程式并未拥有自己的处理序。

sentences.english: Only polyol esters have been found to satisfy this demanding application.
sentences.chinese: 只有多元醇酯找到满足此要求苛刻的应用程式。

sentences.english: Click on any icon and the corresponding application will be activated.
sentences.chinese: 点击任何一个图示，则相对应的应用程式将会被启动。

sentences.english: Requests that the host allocate the requested amount of memory from the heap, and additionally track where the memory was allocated.
sentences.chinese: 要求主应用程式从堆积中配置所要求数量的记忆体。

sentences.english: The application or component must also use a version-specific file structure.
sentences.chinese: 应用程式或元件也必须使用版本特定的档案结构。

sentences.english: Simply writing stored procedures isn't enough to adequately secure your application.
sentences.chinese: 单靠撰写预存程序并不能够确保应用程式的安全性。

sentences.english: Security of the application is implementation-dependent.
sentences.chinese: 应用程式的安全性与实作相关。

sentences.english: Other hosts or sandboxes provide a limited permission set for applications.
sentences.chinese: 其他主机或沙箱对应用程式提供受限制的使用权限。

sentences.english: Obtains isolated storage corresponding to the given application identity.
sentences.chinese: 取得对应于指定的应用程式识别之隔离储存区。

sentences.english: It allows to create standalone modeling applications in minutes. Customized executable and HTML Help files are created.
sentences.chinese: 使用它可以迅速的创建独立的应用程式模型。

sentences.english: Directives that govern application queue limits.
sentences.chinese: 管理应用程式伫列限制的指示词。

sentences.english: Chances are good that it will be used in another, unforeseen, setting.
sentences.chinese: 应用程式很有可能会在其他未预料到的情况下使用。

sentences.english: Dr. Dobb's: What kind of applications are well suited by a DSL solution?
sentences.chinese: 什么类型的应用程式适用DSL的解决方案？

sentences.english: When you see rendering artifacts in an application, try turning off hardware acceleration.
sentences.chinese: 在应用程式中看见转译叠影时，请尝试关闭硬体加速。

sentences.english: In a new, external process that is separate from the host's process.
sentences.chinese: 在与主应用程式之处理序不同的新外部处理序中。
